name: Talekan
appearance: Ash-gray skin, hair bound with a silver thread around a bone chip. Eyes ringed with sleepless ink. Robes smell faintly of lume oil and old vellum.
character: Curious, empathetic, and principled to a fault. Believes rules are scaffolds meant to protect, not cages meant to confine.
talents: sees faint afterimages in fresh marrow-ink
can quote the dead with their cadence
dreams: Prove heartseed studies can stabilize the climate ethically
Write a public rite that heals trust between temple and Hall
secrets: Copied a sealed binding to preserve an ancestor’s last words beyond seven nights
Keeps a private counsel thread with a ‘barrow shade’ that may be something else
